definition: ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound

sentences.english: Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: Description : Raindrops have splashed clay particles and organic matter into the furrows, further than the sand particles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨冲刷使粘土和有机物比沙粒更多的流入垄沟。

sentences.english: I also noticed that most of them had ridges.
sentences.chinese: 我也注意到大多数梅子核上都有隆起的狭长垄沟。

sentences.english: While, the effect of BR on maize growth was not marked.
sentences.chinese: 而单用大垄沟种植对玉米的生长无明显的增进作用。

definition: lines on ridges on ploughed field
ridge between fields/row of crops/grave mound
embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
embankment or foothpath between paddy fields
to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
strip of high ground/low earth dyke separating fields
